summary.span: 为切换动画、可视状态或动画 UI 组件提供动画和情节提要 API。

span.span: Provides animation and storyboard API for transition animations, visual states, or animated UI components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间文档包含仅.NET 投影的投影的 WinRT 类型与不同的 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 类型。This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. 若要查看此命名空间类型的完整列表，请参阅[Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.media.animation) UWP API 参考。To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.media.animation) in the UWP API reference.
